Career.pageSubtitle: A timeline of my academic and professional achievements, shaping my expertise.

Career.codeIgniterDescription: Developed and maintained web applications, implementing new features and optimizing existing ones effectively.

ServicesSection.subtitle: I offer a range of services to help you build and grow your digital presence.
ServicesSection.webDevelopmentDescription: Building responsive, high-performance web applications using modern frameworks for optimal results.
ServicesSection.mobileDevelopmentDescription: Crafting intuitive and engaging mobile experiences for iOS and Android users.
ServicesSection.backendApiDevelopmentDescription: Designing robust, scalable backend systems and RESTful APIs for seamless integration.
ServicesSection.technicalConsultingDescription: Providing expert guidance and solutions for your software architecture and development processes.

SkillsPage.description: Here are the technologies and tools I've mastered throughout my career.

IndexPage.schoolManagementSystemDescription: Comprehensive system for school operations: student records, courses, grades. React, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL.
IndexPage.wineManagementApplicationDescription: Application for managing wine inventory, sales, vineyard operations. Java Spring Boot, Thymeleaf, PostgreSQL.
IndexPage.personalPortfolioWebsiteDescription: My portfolio showcasing projects, skills, career. Built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion.
IndexPage.carSalesManagementPlatformDescription: Platform for managing car sales, inventory, customer data. Java desktop, PHP web app.
IndexPage.realTimeWeatherApplicationDescription: Mobile app providing real-time weather updates. React Native, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, API.
IndexPage.scientificSocialNetworkDescription: Social network for scientific collaboration. Next.js frontend, NestJS backend, PostgreSQL.
IndexPage.aiTrainingGenerationDescription: Project generating AI training data using Python, PyTorch, machine learning, data augmentation.
IndexPage.carMusicPartyDescription: Mobile/web app for collaborative music playlists. React Native, Next.js, Firebase, Socket.IO.
IndexPage.dentalPracticeManagementSystemDescriptio: System for dental practice: appointments, patient records, billing. Figma, Swift, Nuxt.js, MongoDB.
